message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm looking for $15000 for it.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $15000 is outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for this product. Let me know if you're interested in that price.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was really hoping to get closer to my initial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $12000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12000 is still a bit high for me. I'm really hoping to stay within my budget of $8000. Would you be willing to consider that?

I understand that $8000 is your maximum budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
Alice, I understand you have a minimum price, but I'm still sticking to my budget of $8000. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to look elsewhere.  I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I've already met you at $10000 and you rejected it. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $9500. That's the lowest I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $9500. While I value the product, I'm still sticking to my budget of $8000. It's the best I can offer, and I hope you'll reconsider. If not, I'll have to go with another seller.

I'm starting to think we're not going to come to an agreement, Bob. I've already met you at $10000, then $9500, and you've rejected both. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'll meet you at $9000. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options, including selling to someone else.
